text: @WHONigeria @WHO @WHOAFRO @NCDCgov @BrakaFiona @CWarigon @Fmohnigeria @Dr_Okudo @ibrodoc_03 @UN_Nigeria Please can clean water alone do? What if it's infected? I wash mine with morning fresh and rinse till it's completely out. I hope it's ok?
